Welcome to the Dungeon Master accessibility guide!
This app supports: • TalkBack screen reader • High contrast mode for better visibility • Customizable text size • Voice commands for dice rolling • Gesture alternatives for all actions
For TalkBack users: • Swipe right to move to the next item • Double-tap to activate buttons • Three-finger swipe to scroll
Voice Commands: • Say "roll dice" to roll • Say "increase modifier" or "decrease modifier" • Say "switch dice" to change dice type
